page.title: 15 CREDITS : Wootton Wawen
page.content:
When our group originally committed itself to surveying a block of the map it naturally expected to be responsible for the block in which its school, Studley C.E. Junior School, is situated. The group did not expect to be allocated an area with which it had no connection. It was further revealed that the obvious school to carry out the survey (Wootton Wawen C.E Junior School) had itself not been allocated this area.
Studley C.E. Junior School carried out a very comprehensive survey of its own village, Studley. However, this was for local interest only and was not carried out for the "Domesday Project".
